name: CyberHeist (Gamesational)
description:
Cybercriminals are rampant in our world. Every single day, you run the risk of being hacked. The risk increases more if you download executables from untrusted sources. This game allows you to take control of a computer virus. Will your computer virus be the most notorious in history, or will it simply be lost to the sands of time.

There are four Computer Viruses you can use. The first is known as ransomware which demands money from the victim. The second is known as a trojan, which disguises itself as something good, but does bad stuff to your computer after some time. The third is Spyware which can grab data from the user without their consent. The fourth is a Miner, which mines cryptocurrency without consent.
